original_title: 酎ハイれもんLOVE30S 雨にぬれても
overview: Bug-eyed Katsumi (known as Chuhai to his friends) is a muscle-bound detective determined to use his strength and pig-headed stupidity to rescue his teenage girlfriend from a succession of embarrassing situations. Based on a manga by Sho Fumimura and heavily seeded with background music from the 1960s U.S. hit parade.
title: Chuuhai Lemon: Love 30s
